expansion: Love Live! Nijigasaki Academy School Idol Club
ability: 【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《音楽》 Character, during this turn, this card gets +2000 Power. (Return revealed card to its original position)

【A】[Place 1 card from Hand into Waiting Room] When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may pay the cost. If you did, look at up to 4 cards from your top Deck, choose up to 1 card with Level 1 or higher and show it to opponent, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room. (Climax is considered Level 0)

【A】【CXCOMBO】At the beginning of your Encore Step, if 「突然の訪問者 三船 栞子」 is in your Climax Slot, and this card is at Front Row, and you have 2 or more other 《音楽》 Character, if there is no Character facing this card or it's in REVERSE, you may choose 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.

ability: 【A】This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn. During the turn when this card is placed on Stage from Hand, when this card dealt Damage is cancelled, place the top card of your Deck into Waiting Room, deal X Damage to opponent. X is equal to that card's Level +1. (Climax is considered Level 0. Damage can be cancelled)

【A】【CXCOMBO】RECOLLECTION [(1) Place 2 cards from Hand into Waiting Room] This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn.
